name: Bug report
about: Report an error in the plugin. For troubleshooting please use the discussions tab.
title: "[BUG] "
labels: bug
assignees: GospelBG
---

Please note that the issue tracker is ONLY for reporting bugs and submitting feature requests. For troubleshooting help, questions and other enquiries, please use the [Discussions tab](https://github.com/GospelBG/ChatPointsTTV/discussions).

Before submitting an issue, please make sure that there are not any other issues about the same topic. If so, this issue will be closed.

**Describe the bug**  
A clear and concise description of what is not working propertly. What is be the expected behaviour?

**Steps to Reproduce**  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Run `/twitch link`
2. Login with your account
3. [...]

**Screenshot and Logss**  
Please upload any screenshots and full server logs that can help identify the issue, if applicable.

**Error Message** (if applicable)

**Server Software**

- [ ] Spigot
- [ ] Paper
- [ ] Purpur
- [ ] Other (please specify: )

**Additional context**  
Add any other context about the problem here. (i.e. config files)
